Name: XMagicTyping
About the game: XMagicTyping is a funny and powerful effect software for typing that displays amazing effects when you typing. Features Workshop supported - one click download or share typing effects. Many editing options - you can change almost every effects. Support Taskbar transparent Game Mode - will pause effects when you need 100% power for your games. Optimization - reduced equipment requirements. Optimized code created for Low-end devices. Multi-Language - includes 4 languages. Compatible with other software etc. Wallpaper Engine,RainWallpaper Unsupported app list Edge QQ,TIM Modern UI App for Win10 Win10 Startup Menu
